reviews.review: NOT GOOD  ANTI CHEAT  TOO MANY HAKERS

I have been playing this game ever since its CS 1.6 release. I know for sure this game has the biggest Loyal Fan/Player base in the whole world of Esports. I hope Valve adds some system like Battle Pass , or crowd funding for CS:GO events. I hope one day we have CSGO Major with at least 10$ million prize pool. One day...

I think the game is good

I don't like the direction this game has been heading for the past year. It's no longer the ultimate competitive shooter experience i had been enjoying since 1.6 and is becoming the same generic BS pandering to the average 10 year old all the other game companies put out. I hate that Valve forces this down our throats. At the least create an option to hide all this unnecessary clutter from the game.. Any source servers still up?
Great Shooter, just have hassles when it came to installing backed up files.
2k hours in this shit. Anti cheat very bad but its so funny players there
A very classic and skill based game. Fun to play.
